channel.title: replace on What, Why, How
channel.description: Recent content in replace on What, Why, How

item.title: Sed
item.description: Getting started Sed Usage Syntax 1 $ sed [options] command [input-file] With pipeline 1 $ cat report.txt | sed 's/Nick/John/g' 1 $ echo '123abc' | sed 's/[0-9]+//g' Option Examples Option Example Description -i sed -ibak ’s/On/Off/' php.ini Backup and modify input file directly -E sed -E ’s/[0-9]+//g' input-file Use extended regular expressions -n sed -n ‘3 p’ config.
